hero.name: João
hero.subtitle1: Teacher turned developer (or developer who never stopped being a teacher).

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: Full Stack Developer and teacher with experience in Robotics, Digital Education, Music and Arts, combining technology and creativity for a multidisciplinary approach to teaching.
about.paragraph2: I work with technologies like React, Node.js, Next.js, Astro, Express for REST APIs, MongoDB/PostgreSQL, TypeScript and TailwindCSS, with flexibility to adapt tools according to project needs.
about.paragraph3: I have knowledge of versioning with Git, container usage with Docker, design and prototyping with Figma, and efficient team communication via Slack.
